channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Cloud-Ham Blog

item.title: Analysis: Azure Custom Script Extension (Windows)
item.description: Today we’re looking at Azure Custom Script Extensions. These are Azure VM extensions that will run a PowerShell script, or sh script for Linux, on a VM. For most of the blog, Custom Script Extensions will be written as CSEs for short. We’re going to be looking at a few things throughout this, such as: How does it work? How do we find out what script is running? Can we find deleted CSEs?
